characters: Child on the road, car ahead
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with buildings on both sides. A child suddenly appears from the right side of the road and runs into the path of the vehicle, causing an immediate need for braking. The car ahead is maintaining a steady speed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle had to perform an emergency brake to avoid hitting the child who suddenly appeared from the right side of the road. The vehicles speed decreased rapidly to prevent a collision.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A child, approximately 1 meter away, suddenly running into the road from the right side, causing the vehicle to brake immediately. 2) Front: A red car, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a steady speed.
